title: Secret Consultation
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Excuse me, Mari-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>My, Riko, it’s rare for you to come to the director’s office<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I wanted to talk to you about something…. Is this a good time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! I’d be happy to hear it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s about our next song. I’ve narrowed down the chorus’ melody to two candidates, but I don’t know which one to pick…. Can you listen to them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Alright, but which one do you like more, Riko?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hmm….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Then, close your eyes, try to imagine Aqours singing the song, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>O-, okay….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>….in your head, which one of the two melodies do you enjoy more? I’m sure you can visualize them, Riko<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>The first one I made, maybe?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, then we’ll go with that♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh? But I wanted you to listen to them, Mari-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I can understand without listening to them! It’s something you made after all, Riko. Have more confidence in yourself♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
